title: Saki Achiga-hen: Episode of Side-A - Kuro no Tanjoubi
original_name: 咲-Saki-阿知賀編 episode of side-A ショートオリジナルアニメ「玄の誕生日」

sinopse: Short original anime bundled with the limited edition Blu-ray Box of Saki Achiga-hen: Episode of Side-A.
